content: नी {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> (नयति-ते, निनाय निन्ये, अनैषीत-अनेष्ट, नेष्यति-ते, नेतुं, नीत) (One of the roots that govern two accusatives, see examples below) {@--1@} To carry, lead, bring, convey, take, conduct; अजां ग्रामं नयति Sk; नय मां नवेन वसतिं पयोमुचा <ls>V. 4. 43.</ls> {@--2@} To guide, direct, govern; <ls>M. 1. 2.</ls> {@--3@} To lead away to, carry or bring away; सीता लंकां नीता सुरारिणा <ls>Bk. 6. 49</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 103</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 88.</ls> {@--4@} To carry off; <ls>Śānti. 3. 5.</ls> {@--5@} To carry off for oneself (Atm). {@--6@} To spend, or pass (as time); येनामंदमरंदे दलदरविंदे दिनान्यनायिषत <ls>Bv. 1. 10</ls>; नीत्वा मासान् कतिचित् <ls>Me. 2</ls>; संविष्टः कुशशयने निशां निनाय <ls>R. 1. 95.</ls> {@--7@} To bring or reduce any person to any state or condition; तमपि तरलतामनयदनंगः <ls>K. 143</ls>; नीतस्त्वया पंचतां <ls>Ratn. 3. 3</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 19.</ls> (In this sense the root is used with substantives much in the same way as कृ <ab>q. v.</ab>; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} दुःखं नी to reduce to misery; वशं नी to reduce to subjection, win over; अस्तं नी to cause to set; विनाशं नी to destroy; परितोषं नी to gratify, please; शूद्रतां-दासत्वं &c. नी to reduce to the state of a Śūdra, slave &c.; साक्ष्यं नी to admit as a witness; दंडं नी to inflict punishment upon, to punish; पुनरुक्ततां नी to render superfluous; विक्रयं नी to sell; भस्मतां-भस्मसात्-नी to reduce to ashes &c. &c.). {@--8@} To ascertain, investigate, inquire into, settle, decide; छलं निरस्य भूतेन व्यवहारान्नयेन्नृपः <ls>Y. 2. 19</ls>; एवं शास्त्रेषु भिन्नेषु बहुधा नीयते क्रिया <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--9@} To trace, track, find out; एतैर्लिगैर्नयेत् सीमां <ls>Ms. 8. 252</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">256</ls>; यथा नयत्यसृक्पातैर्मृगस्य मृगयुः पदं <ls n="Ms.">8. 44</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 151.</ls> {@--10@} To marry. {@--11@} To exclude from. {@--12@} (<ab>Atm.</ab>) To instruct, give instruction in; शास्त्रे नयते <ls>Sk.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (नाययति-ते) To cause to lead, carry &c. (with <ab>instr.</ab> of agent); तेन मां सरस्तीरमनाययत् <ls>K. 38.</ls> {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} (निनीषति-ते) To wish to carry &c.
नी {%<ab>m.</ab>%} (Used at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) A leader, guide; as in ग्रामणी, सेनानी, अग्रणी.
